description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. Pterodactyls want blood!  In a dystopian future where humans love guns and zombies just want to be left alone, the pterodactyls have seen to it that everyone has to be miserable together.    Take your jetpack online and splatter some fools with blades, guns, grenades, and other instruments of mayhem.  Earn XP, level up, unlock stuff, and build killer classes!
description.short: Pterodactyls want blood!
